Framework
Interface ICoreMgr

All Known Implementing Classes:
CoreMgr
public interface ICoreMgr

ICore implementations provide the core functionality for the top-level aquarium simulation class.

Version:
0.4
Author:
Marc Price

Method Summary
abstract  void addRenderable(Renderable token)
          Add a renderable object to the world.
abstract  void createWorld()
          METHOD: create and initialise the environment (aka 'world')
abstract  void destroyWorld()
          METHOD: destroy the 3D world.
abstract  void removeRenderable(Renderable token)
          Remove a renderable object from the world.
abstract  void updateWorld()
          Apply all updates to the environment.
abstract  env3d.Env world()
          Accessor for the Env3D world object
 

Method Detail

addRenderable

void addRenderable(Renderable token)
Add a renderable object to the world.

Parameters:
token - an object of type Renderable that is to be displayed in the virtual world.

createWorld

void createWorld()
METHOD: create and initialise the environment (aka 'world')

destroyWorld

void destroyWorld()
METHOD: destroy the 3D world. Although there is a garbage-collector in Java, the world has to be destroyed with 'destroyWorld' in order to close-down your simulation-loop cleanly.

removeRenderable

void removeRenderable(Renderable token)
Remove a renderable object from the world.

Parameters:
token - an object of type Renderable that is to be removed from the virtual world.

updateWorld

void updateWorld()
Apply all updates to the environment. This must be called at the end of each pass through the simulation loop.

world

env3d.Env world()
Accessor for the Env3D world object

Returns:
the Env3D world object
